item.description: HackVSIT6.0 lived up to its name as North Indiaâ€™s Biggest Hackathon. Organised by ACE â€“ Association of Computer Enthusiasts, the technical society of Vivekananda Institute of Professional Studies, New Delhi, it brought together hundreds of brilliant minds brimming with passion, purpose, and a vision to solve real-world problems with technology. It was an absolute pleasure to join the jury panel, alongside an esteemed group of leaders from across the industry:
